alignmentAnalysisConfig.name: Sequence Variation Analyses with Goby
alignmentAnalysisConfig.help: Compares groups of samples and produce output about sequence variants observed in the alignments. Implemented with Goby. Specific analysis depends on selected output format.

option.name: Type of analysis and output format
option.help: Determines the type of sequence variation analysis to perform and the output format.

option.name: Number of top hits
option.help: Number of hits to report if no candidates has an adjusted p-value above the q-value threshold.

option.name: q-value threshold
option.help: Threshold on q-value (p-values adjusted for multiple testing). A candidate will be reported if any of its q-value is larger or equal to the threshold.
